channel.title: 99 construction~
channel.description:
Yep I am going for 99 construction LEGITLY!
I was wondering if you think I should make a big dungeon or a big house(with no dungeon). For the 99con party later on? If you want a dungeon just tell me what you want in it as well^^
[center]10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 90 95 99[/center] Green = I got it. Red = I don't got it.
I plan to use 1-2k oak planks a day on my house(about 1m or so). Making money legit as well.

item.title: 99 construction~
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Umm I want to do the con my self tbh. I will bot to get the cash but I want to get the con levels my self ^^ and sure we can party at your place

Read full topic

item.title: 99 construction~
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

You should use the construction script I made. I even bought a paid script and it sucked so I made one and it was pro, got me 75-99 in 4 days. I’ll send you it if you want.

House party @ my house later? Username: cheesecurl m

Read full topic

item.title: 99 construction~
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Tahoraks you where going to do dungeon doors right? from 74-99.

But yeah thanks the thing I am going to do this week is just mine the shit of of the coal rocks until next Saturday. Then sell all of the ore on that Sunday then use all the cash on oak planks and see what level I get to.

but thanks

Read full topic

item.title: 99 construction~
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This is what I wanted to do. 99 Con has been my goal for agesss. I have an entire plan setup for 75-99, plus the house. I think I priced everything at the end to about 130m, which isn’t too bad at all. It’s just not the easiest thing in the world to collect 130m.

Best of luck to you, mate.

Read full topic
